survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Meal Kit Delivery Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience with meal kit delivery services, including satisfaction with delivery, meal variety, and overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meals offered by the meal kit delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meals offered by the meal kit delivery service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a meal kit delivery service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture key decision factors.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a meal kit delivery service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the freshness of the ingredients received in your meal kits?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess ingredient freshness.

script.question_text: How would you rate the freshness of the ingredients received in your meal kits?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the meal kit delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the meal kit delivery service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this meal kit delivery service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this meal kit delivery service to a friend or colleague?
